Name: Gameinformer
Descriptions: Game Informer is your source for the latest in video game news, reviews, previews, podcasts, and features.

Name: IGN
Descriptions: IGN is your #1 destination for all video game news, expert reviews, and walkthroughs.

Name: Gamespot
Descriptions: GameSpot is the world's leading source for PS4, Xbox One, PS3, Xbox 360, Wii U, PS Vita, Wii, PC, 3DS, and DS video game news, reviews, previews, trailers, walkthroughs, and more.

Name: Kotaku
Descriptions: Gaming Reviews, News, Tips and More.

Name: Polygon
Descriptions: Polygon is a gaming website in partnership with Vox Media. Our culture focused site covers games, their creators, the fans, trending stories and entertainment news.

Name: Rock Paper Shotgun
Descriptions: Rock, Paper, Shotgun - PC gaming news, previews, reviews, opinion

Name: gameindustrybiz
Descriptions: The resource for people who make and sell games. GamesIndustry.biz is the market leading website and community for news and information about the global video games industry.

Name: GamesRadar
Descriptions: GamesRadar+ takes you closer to the games, movies and TV you love.

Name: escapist
Descriptions: The Escapist is an outlet dedicated to providing our readers and viewers with smart coverage of video games, movies, tv shows and everything geek culture.

Name: Verge
Descriptions: The Verge was founded in 2011 in partnership with Vox Media, and covers the intersection of technology, science, art, and culture. Its mission is to offer in-depth reporting and long-form feature stories, breaking news coverage, product information, and community content in a unified and cohesive manner. The site is powered by Vox Media's Chorus platform, a modern media stack built for web-native news in the 21st century.

Name: Engadget
Descriptions: Engadget is the original home for technology news and reviews. Since its founding in 2004, we've grown from an exhaustive source for consumer tech news to a global multimedia organization covering the intersection of technology, gaming and entertainment.

Name: Gamasutra
Descriptions: Daily news, interviews, features, and developer blogs about the Art & Business of Making Games.

Name: Indie Database
Descriptions: Indie DB the independent games site. News, downloads and media direct from the developers. Powered by ramen noodles.

Name: Giant Bomb
Descriptions: The largest video game database online, Giant Bomb features Game Reviews, News, Videos, and Forums for the latest in PS4, Xbox One, PS3, Xbox 360, Wii, PSP, DS, 3DS, NGP, and more!

Name: PC Gamer
Descriptions: PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.

Name: Inside Gaming
Descriptions: Rooster Teeth is your home for the best in gaming, comedy, and animation! Watch live and join us in chat, or stream new episodes and old favorites on demand from your home and mobile devices.

Name: PC  Mag
Descriptions: PCMag is your complete guide to computers, peripherals and upgrades. We test and review tech products and services, report technology news and trends, and provide shopping advice with price comparisons.

Name: Eurogamer
Descriptions: Eurogamer.net was founded in September 1999 and has been covering video games ever since. The site began life with a PC focus and a keen interest in the competitive FPS scene of the time, but over the years it has grown to cover every aspect of gaming - PC, console, indie, board games and anything else that the team and the site's readers find interesting.

Name: Game Zone
Descriptions: GameZone works to bring gamers everything there is to know about the game industry, from breaking game news to reviews and rumors. In addition to gaming, we bring relevant culture and entertainment news.

Name: Destructoid
Descriptions: The latest gaming news, game reviews and trailers.

Name: Next Generation Esports
Descriptions: Gaming is in our DNA. We’re world-class production experts who genuinely love gaming. And our enthusiasm for each game we work with is obvious.

Name: MCV/DEVELOP
Descriptions: Games industry news and analysis covering development, publishing, platforms, marketing and retail | MCV/DEVELOP

Name: GameDaily.biz
Descriptions: We Make Games Our Business

Name: Game Industry News
Descriptions: Game Industry News publishes independent reviews, editorials, news, stock market reports, interviews and podcasts every week on our website.

Name: Games Press
Descriptions: Press releases and assets from across the games industry - screenshots, videos, logos, packshots, artwork, PR contacts, release dates

Name: GaymingMag
Descriptions: The home of LGBTQ video game news on the internet

Name: PC Games Insider
Descriptions: All the latest news about the business of PC games

Name: PocketGamer.biz
Descriptions: Mobile games industry news, discussion, analysis, opinion, events, jobs, and more

Name: VentureBeat
Descriptions: The latest Games news, analysis, and insight from VentureBeat, the most authoritative source on transformative technology.

Name: Video Games Chronicle
Descriptions: VGC is the expert source for video games news. We deliver daily exclusive news, insight and critique to a knowledgeable audience who trust our coverage.

Name: Vice
Descriptions: VICE is the definitive guide to enlightening information.

Name: Wireframe
Descriptions: Wireframe: the fortnightly magazine that lifts the lid on video games

Name: Bloomberg
Descriptions: Video Games news, business analysis, commentary, long-form features, polling, original video, interactive graphics, and more from the nation's leading business commentators.

Name: Shacknews
Descriptions: Video Game Video Reviews, Celebrity Interviews, Strategy Videos, Original Content and More

Name: GameFAQs
Descriptions: Video Games Database with Guides, Q&A, Boards, and Reviews

Name: Metacritic
Descriptions: Metacritic aggregates music, game, tv, and movie reviews from the leading critics. Only Metacritic.com uses METASCORES, which let you know at a glance how each item was reviewed.

Name: Submit
Descriptions: List of News Outlets

Name: Indie Games+
Descriptions: Indie Games Plus - Creative, Personal, Passionate Digital Experiences

Name: IndieGameLover
Descriptions: Indie Game Lover is here to provide admiration and inspiration through the love of indie games.
